original_text: Will I save these people from the power of death? Will I rescue them from their graves? Death, what diseases can you bring? What can you do to hurt my people? 13: Hosea says that God will bring trouble and death to his people because of their sins. Paul uses these words in Will I save these people from the power of death? Will I rescue them from their graves? Death, what diseases can you bring? What can you do to hurt my people? 13: Hosea says that God will bring trouble and death to his people because of their sins. Paul uses these words in Will I save these people from the power of death? Will I rescue them from their graves? Death, what diseases can you bring? What can you do to hurt my people? 13: Hosea says that God will bring trouble and death to his people because of their sins. Paul uses these words in Will I save these people from the power of death? Paul uses these words in Will I save these people from the power of death?
korean_text: 내가 그들을 스올의 권세에서 속량하며 사망에서 구속하리니 사망아 네 재앙이 어디 있느냐 스올아 네 멸망이 어디 있느냐 뉘우침이 내 눈 앞에서 숨으리라

sentences.original_text: Death, what diseases can you bring?
sentences.korean_translation: 사망이여, 너는 어떤 질병을 가져올 수 있느냐

sentences.original_text: What can you do to hurt my people?
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 내 백성을 해치기 위해 무엇을 할 수 있느냐
